mapper.insert: insert into users (uno, userid, passwd, email, uname, name, passport, sex, birth, post, address1, address2, createdate, eaccess) values(SEQ_USERS_uno.nextval, #{userid}, #{passwd},#{email}, #{uname},#{name},#{passport}, #{sex},#{birth},#{post}, #{address1},#{address2}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: select count(*) from users where userid=#{value}
select count(*) from users where email =#{value}
select count(*) from users where uname =#{value}
mapper.update: update users set passwd=#{passwd}, email=#{email}, uname= #{uname}, name=#{name}, passport=#{passport}, birth =#{birth}, post =#{post}, address1= #{address1}, address2=#{address2} where userid= #{userid}
